data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Liege get the game underway.
Goal! Michael Ngadeu gives Liege a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 27, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Nurio Fortuna.
The first-half is over at Ghelamco Arena.
The second-half has commenced. Gent with the kick-off.
In the minute 50, Gojko Cimirot is booked for the away team.
Liege make their first substitution with Michel Ange Balikwisha replacing Maxime Lestienne.
Philippe Montanier is making the team's second substitution at Ghelamco Arena with Obbi Oulare replacing Abdoul Tapsoba.
In the minute 70, Tim Kleindienst is replacing Alessio Castro-Montes for the home team.
The away team replace Gojko Cimirot with Selim Amallah.
Roman Yaremchuk scores to make it 2-1 at Ghelamco Arena.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Sinan Bolat (Gent) has received a yellow card from Lawrence Visser.
Bruno Godeau is on a sub for Milad Mohammadi for Gent.
